name: df-ismt
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cismt, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cab(s2, wa(wf1o(cv(s2), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cfv(cbs, cv(s1))), wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cds, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4))), co(cv(s3), cfv(cds, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ Ismt =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s2 |((s2 :(Base ` s0)‚Üî(Base ` s1))‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0), ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà(Base ` s0),((s2 ` s3)[(dist ` s1)](s2 ` s4))=(s3[(dist ` s0)]s4))))})
comment: Define the set of isometries between two structures. Definition 4.8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 36. See ~ isismt . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2019.)
